attributes.title: Worst. App. Ever.
attributes.review: Honestly this app is the worst. I thought it would help make his plan clear but instead it’s just a bunch of crap. Granted maybe that’s the plan. But the app is trash, poorly developed, and shouldn’t even be an option.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET ITTTTTTT
attributes.review: so i was opening the app store but then i saw this orange ugly looking person and i got really scared i thought i was supposed to vote but i got scared wth this app is terrible never using it again it crashes, lagged,and other annoying stuff too

It a really bad app!!! It keeps crashing whenever i open so i cant even support the cheeto by downloading the app. Its not bad for me since idc but for others it might be really upseting. Would not recommend downloading!!!!!!

attributes.title: It’s a no for me
attributes.review: I know this isn’t supposed to be a top news source but like they still can’t give the right facts about anything. It’s all fake news. Lost a brain cell everytime I opened this app

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: I’m totally not part of the tiktok gen z thing. this made my phone crash and it broke my sim card so i had to get a completely new phone. It also kept texting me like 24/7. Trump 2020 though😁😁😁

attributes.title: I’m ashamed I downloaded it
attributes.review: what the heck?? Who gave this Cheeto man an app? I downloaded it so I could give a bad review. Don’t get mad bc I have an opinion that’s different from yours. chile I just don’t think this Oompa Loompa should have an app imo. Tbh don’t rlly care tho bc I cant even vote🥳🤩🤪🤩😘🤓🎅🏼🔪

attributes.title: not what i expected
attributes.review: everytime i open the app, a large man in a maga hat appears outside my window and starts to scream fox news articles at me. i’ve tried deleting and reinstalling hoping to solve the issue, but instead when i open after reinstalling, a different man in a maga hat appears yelling out different articles. i’ve had to install extra locks just to protect myself. there has to be an update to fix this.

attributes.title: Tik Tok
attributes.review:
you’re a disgrace to the world 
You maniac you’re not even letting police officers take our emergency in this little girl for this little boy crying because you came into his classroom and we are so sad we can’t get a new president I hate you😭😭😭😭🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I’m not here to have a good time. I’m here to get things done. This app doesn’t fulfill any of things that it has promised and it has damaged me on a mental level. I cannot take this anymore. I’d advise eating this app 1 star for these reasons.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I’m a maga loving trump 2020 conservative who wants to take away people’s rights and this app is horrible do NOT waste your time downloading it. If trump saw what was on here he would demand to have it taken down!! I will not stand for the horrid thing to be on the App Store
